Legends of Aethereus
fantasy action MMORPG, proposing to explore the world Aethereus 
as an officer of the inventor or cartographer. The game has both 
single-player and multiplayer campaign (which enables you to travel 
in co-op or battle each other in the arena). Other features of the 
project include the possibility to decorate their city. For this is 
a vast assortment of statues, flags and other paraphernalia. The combat 
system Legends of Aethereus is built on the creation of traps and 
interaction with the environment. The game also has the ability to 
create your own scenarios, using a collection of monsters and various 
inventions.
